data.question: How do I reset my password?
data.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

data.question: What are the system requirements?
data.answer: Our platform supports modern browsers (Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+, Edge 90+) and requires JavaScript enabled.

data.question: How can I upgrade my plan?
data.answer: Go to Settings > Billing and select 'Upgrade Plan'. Choose your desired plan and complete the payment process.

data.question: Is there a mobile app available?
data.answer: Yes, our mobile apps are available on both iOS App Store and Google Play Store.

data.question: How do I contact support?
data.answer: You can contact our support team via live chat, email at support@example.com, or phone at 1-800-SUPPORT.
